user_question: What would happen if a tennis ball was made of metal and used in a professional match?
final_answer: If a tennis ball were made of metal and used in a professional match, it would drastically change the dynamics of the game. The ball would be much heavier, affecting the speed and bounce, making it difficult to play. It could also pose safety risks to players and damage equipment and the court surface.
